name: AFT Survival Regression
description: Accelerated failure time (AFT) model which is a parametric survival regression model for censored data.
output: It generates the LAFTSurvivalRegressionModel and passes it to the next Predict and ModelSave Nodes. The input DataFrame is also passed along to the next nodes.

fields.name: featuresCol
fields.title: Features Column
fields.description: Features column of type vectorUDT for model fitting

fields.name: labelCol
fields.title: Label Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: censorCol
fields.title: Censor Column
fields.description: Indicator of the event has occurred or not. If the value is 1.O, it means the event has occurred i.e. uncensored; otherwise censored

fields.name: fitIntercept
fields.title: Fit Intercept
fields.description: Whether to fit an intercept term

fields.name: tol
fields.title: Tolerance
fields.description: The convergence tolerance for iterative algorithms

fields.name: quantileProbabilities
fields.title: QuantileProbabilities
fields.description: Values of the quantile probabilities array should be in the range (0, 1)

fields.name: quantilesCol
fields.title: Quantiles Column
fields.description: The quantiles column created during model scoring

fields.name: predictionCol
fields.title: Prediction Column
fields.description: The prediction column created during model scoring
